''Our businesses are doing very well around the globe, and as a result I'm happy to announce we'll be adding 1,000 new employees in Europe and make some significant investments,'' explained Eric Schmidt . Hundreds of these people will be located right here in our technology center in Munich. the Los Angeles Lakers on Tuesday night. Allen Iverson helped pull the Sixers( 31-33) to four games of Boston for first place in the Atlantic Division. ''It made me feel good,'' Allen Iverson said. Any win makes me feel good. Allen Iverson , though, chipped a bone in his left thumb sometime in the second half and will be fitted for a cast. He is day-to-day. Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept. No state needs to declare bankruptcy, Bill Lockyer said, ''The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't.'' Bill Lockyer 's point-- a valid one-- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments
